properties.title: Pumppark Martigny-Croix
properties.abstract: The Martigny-Croix pump track is located within the sports facility of the Martigny-Combe municipality. The skid-resistant asphalt loop extends over an area of 1000 m2 and accommodates a variety of sports on two or more wheels.
properties.description:
The Martigny-Croix pump track is located directly behind the school building. On the non-skid asphalt surface it is particularly easy to gain speed. The weather-resistant track is also great to practice tricks. 

The pump track was designed with various sports in mind. It can be used with mountain bikes, BMX bikes, skateboards, scooters, and rollerblades. The mix of skate park and pump track is considered to be the first pump park in the Romandie region. The park additionally comprises a multi-function sports centre, a table tennis facility and an area for the guests to meet.


Surface: asphalt
Surface area: 1000 m2
properties.name: Commune de Martigny-Combe
